Trade/Device Name(s): Human IgA liquid reagent kit for use on SPAPLUS
Human IgA liquid reagent kit for use on SPAPLUS®
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, And E Immunological Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Human IgA liquid reagent kit for quantitative in vitro determination of IgA using SPAPLUS turbidimetric analyser
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative in vitro determination of human IgA in serum, lithium heparin or EDTA plasma; aids diagnosis of abnormal protein metabolism and susceptibility to infection, results to be used in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings
